aceatusc.heading: Adaptive Computing Experiences Lab
description: Worked under Prof. Souti Chattopadhyay as a Research Assistant at the Adaptive Computing Experiences Lab (ACE) at USC
Published a paper titled “SciSO: Mining Science in StackOverflow” in the Mining Software Repositories '25 Conference

django.heading: Django
description: Contributed patches, new features, and bug fixes to django.

deeplearning.heading: Deep Learning Notes
description: A Google Doc containing my notes for deeplearning.ai's deep learning courses and specializations on coursera.

• Deep Learning and Neural Networks
  • Improving Deep Neural Networks
  • Structuring Machine Learning Projects
  • Convolutional Neural Networks
  • Sequence Models
  • TensorFlow Developer Certificate

aoc.heading: AOC
description: A repository of my attempts at Advent of Code, a competitive programming advent calendar held every December
